001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007
008public class ElasticNet<N extends Number> implements GradientDescentOptimizer.Interceptor<N> {
009
010    private final L1Regularization<N> l1;
011    private final L2Regularization<N> l2;
012    private final GradientDescentOptimizer.Interceptor<N> interceptor;
013
014    public ElasticNet(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> numberTypeSupport) {
015        this(numberTypeSupport.zero(), numberTypeSupport.zero());
016    }
017
018    public ElasticNet(N lambda1, N lambda2) {
019        this.l1 = new L1Regularization<>(lambda1);
020        this.l2 = new L2Regularization<>(lambda2);
021        this.interceptor = GradientDescentOptimizer.Interceptor.of(l1, l2);
022    }
023
024    public void setLambda1(N lambda1) {
025        this.l1.setLambda(lambda1);
026    }
027
028    public N getLambda1() {
029        return this.l1.getLambda();
030    }
031
032    public void setLambda2(N lambda2) {
033        this.l2.setLambda(lambda2);
034    }
035
036    public N getLambda2() {
037        return this.l2.getLambda();
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    public Vector<N> interceptGradients(int epoch, LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model, DataSet<N> trainSet, GradientDescentOptimizer<N> optimizer, Vector<N> gradients) {
042        return interceptor.interceptGradients(epoch, model, trainSet, optimizer, gradients);
043    }
044}
